template.description:
This plugin can build automated machine images with Packer.
Documentation is available here: https://plugins.drone.io/plugins/
NOTE: Setting actions is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting vars is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting var_files is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting except is not included due to unsupported variable type
NOTE: Setting only is not included due to unsupported variable type
template.name: Packer
